Class addWindow

java.lang.Object
addWindow
public class addWindow extends Object
This class contains the methods and logic used to manually add albums to the DB and display the GUI for adding/importing albums.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    createAndShowGUI()
    This is the non-static method that creates and displays the GUI elements for adding/importing an album to the DB.
    static void
    run()
    A static helper method used to invoke the non-static method which displays the GUI window for adding/importing albums to the DMS.

  • Method Details

    • run

      public static void run()
      A static helper method used to invoke the non-static method which displays the GUI window for adding/importing albums to the DMS.

    • createAndShowGUI

      public void createAndShowGUI()
      This is the non-static method that creates and displays the GUI elements for adding/importing an album to the DB.

    • validateAndSaveAlbum

      public boolean validateAndSaveAlbum(JFrame frame, JTextField albumIdField, JTextField albumNameField, JTextField artistNameField, JTextField genreField, JTextField ratingField, JTextField trackCountField, JTextField runtimeField)
      This method is used to validate that the information entered into the import album fields is valid. If one of the fields is invalid, it will be highlighted red and an error popup will appear letting the user know that the field needs to be corrected.
      Parameters:
      frame - This is the JFrame that the fields are located on. This will be passed to the showMessageDialog() method to create an error popup.
      albumIdField - This is the album ID text field from the GUI.
      albumNameField - This is the album name text field from the GUI.
      artistNameField - This is the artist name text field from the GUI.
      genreField - This is the genre text field from the GUI.
      ratingField - This is the rating text field from the GUI.
      trackCountField - This is the track count text field from the GUI.
      runtimeField - This is the runtime text field from the GUI.
      Returns:
      A boolean value where True means that the album information was valid and the album was saved. False means one or more of the fields provided was improperly formatted.
